title: I think my biggest failing as Support is...

replies.body: You can't save everyone. Save the most important ones or the ones who need saving first.
never leave the adc alone when there is an enemy in lane, unless you have vision of all 5 and your adc is healthy

My biggest fail is to try to carry when i'm playing with total trash teammates. It only gets things worse. You cannot do anything to carry the game, you need to do really big korean shit to carry a game with nami when your teammates are thrash. And since i'm not korean..... you know...
Personally, as a support myself, I won't leave bot unless my adc backed when I don't have to and the lane is pushed. Then and only then will I look to mid lane during laning phase.
The trick is to be super aggressive 24/7. No need to save people when you've killed the enemy already :P
